sub_concepts.name: RESTful API
sub_concepts.definition: A type of web API that follows the principles of REST (Representational State Transfer) architecture for designing networked applications

sub_concepts.name: SOAP API
sub_concepts.definition: A protocol for exchanging structured information in the implementation of web services in computer networks

sub_concepts.name: GraphQL API
sub_concepts.definition: A query language for APIs and runtime for executing those queries written in a server-side runtime environment

sub_concepts.name: RPC API
sub_concepts.definition: Remote Procedure Call API allows a program to execute code on another address space in a network
